title: circDCBLD2 regulates the Th1/Th2 immune balance via the miR-26a-5p/PTEN axis.
abstract: Asthma is a prevalent chronic respiratory disease in children. Recently, adjusting the Th1/Th2 imbalance has become a significant focus in asthma immunotherapy. The present study aims to investigate the roles and mechanisms of circDCBLD2 in maintaining the Th1/Th2 immune balance. CircDCBLD2 is downregulated in CD4
